means: 只有一种含意地，清楚明白地

sentence.Network_en: Temperature records have unequivocally confirmed the existence of global warming.
sentence.Network_cn: 气温记录清楚无疑地证实了全球气候正在变暖。
她明白地说出了她的意图.

sentence.Network_en: He stated unequivocally that the French forces were ready to go to war.
sentence.Network_cn: 他明确表态法国军队准备参战。

紫澜剑_新浪博客 ... equivocally 模棱两可地 unequivocally 毫不含糊地 vague 模糊的.
自动地;以自由意志 (Unconditionally) 确定地(Positively)不含糊地 (Unequivocally) n. volunteer Phrase: Voluntarily join 自愿加入 But voluntarily 而出于自愿.
studies unequivocally that men are far more interested in short-term casual sex than women .相关研究明确表名，对于短期、随意的性交，男人远比女人更有性趣。

list.abs: WAFFLE 说话含浑，胡扯v.speak unequivocally清楚的说DICRETE 不连续的，分立的adj.
" We to send a clear and unequivocal message , " she said .她说：“我们希望发出明确而直率的信息。
毫不含糊的；明确的：不容许疑问或误解的；明确和不含糊的：eg. anunequivocal success. 明确成功10. Baptist: A member of an evangelical Protestant church of
No published investigation has provided unequivocal evidence ., 已发表的研究没有提供明显的证据.

entry.tran: 毫不含糊的；清楚明白的
entry.def: If you describe someone's attitude as unequivocal, you mean that it is completely clear and very firm.

example.tran: 理查森对公平竞争的明确承诺

example.ex: Yesterday, the message to him was unequivocal: 'Get out.'
example.tran: 昨天，给他的信息很明确：“滚开。”
